description: Jason isn't having much luck finding a girl online (his nasty troll approach leaves much to be desired), so he hires an escort. Cheyenne (Victoria Voxxx) is grossed out by his dirty, messy basement room, and annoyed when he tries to haggle about her price. And she absolutely refuses to get on sheets that haven't been changed in ages. Jason stomps off and returns with a pretty comforter, ready for his blow job. But not so fast. Jason's mother (Dee Williams) barges in, pissed off that Jason has taken the comforter off her bed. Jason tries to pass his escort off as his girlfriend, but it doesn't help that he doesn't know her name. Cheyenne thinks it's hilarious that Jason lives in his mother's basement, and the two women start to chat. And pay each other compliments. Pretty soon, mom kicks Jason off the bed and starts to kiss Cheyenne, all the while insulting her loser son. Jason sits by helplessly as the women undress and mom starts to lick Cheyenne's pussy. (Part 1 of 4)
title: Cuckolded By My Mom! (Part 1 or 4)
